name: Flight 732
description: Explore the island to find the missing jetliner. Once found, can you find a way to help you and your captain off of the island?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
